title: Task Type
description: Valid AdCP task types across all domains. These represent the complete set of operations that can be tracked via the task management system.

enumDescriptions.create_media_buy: Media-buy domain: Create a new advertising campaign with one or more packages
enumDescriptions.update_media_buy: Media-buy domain: Update campaign settings, package configuration, or delivery parameters
enumDescriptions.sync_creatives: Media-buy domain: Sync creative assets to publisher's library with upsert semantics
enumDescriptions.activate_signal: Signals domain: Activate an audience signal on a specific platform or account
enumDescriptions.get_signals: Signals domain: Discover available audience signals based on natural language description
enumDescriptions.create_property_list: Property domain: Create a new property list with filters and brand manifest
enumDescriptions.update_property_list: Property domain: Update an existing property list
enumDescriptions.get_property_list: Property domain: Retrieve a property list with resolved properties
enumDescriptions.list_property_lists: Property domain: List all accessible property lists
enumDescriptions.delete_property_list: Property domain: Delete a property list
enumDescriptions.sync_measurement_events: Media-buy domain: Configure measurement IDs on an account with upsert semantics
enumDescriptions.log_event: Media-buy domain: Send conversion or marketing events for attribution

notes: Task types map to specific AdCP task operations
Each task type belongs to the 'media-buy', 'signals', 'property', or 'creative' domain
This enum is used in task management APIs (tasks/list, tasks/get) and webhook payloads
New task types require a minor version bump per semantic versioning
